TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlServerDbFunctionsExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides CLR methods that get translated to database functions when used in LINQ to Entities queries. The methods on this class are accessed via .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Contains (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string propertyReference, string searchCondition);
.method public static hidebysig bool Contains(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string propertyReference, string searchCondition) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Contains (_ As DbFunctions, propertyReference As String, searchCondition As String) As Boolean
static member Contains : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions * string * string -> bool

Docs.param: The property on which the search will be performed.
The text that will be searched for in the property and the condition for a match.

summary.para: A DbFunction method stub that can be used in LINQ queries to target the SQL Server CONTAINS store function.

Docs.returns: To be added.
Docs.remarks: This DbFunction method has no in-memory implementation and will throw if the query switches to client-evaluation. This can happen if the query contains one or more expressions that could not be translated to the store.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Contains (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string propertyReference, string searchCondition, int languageTerm);
.method public static hidebysig bool Contains(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, string propertyReference, string searchCondition, int32 languageTerm) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Contains (_ As DbFunctions, propertyReference As String, searchCondition As String, languageTerm As Integer) As Boolean
static member Contains : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions * string * string * int -> bool

Docs.param: The property on which the search will be performed.
The text that will be searched for in the property and the condition for a match.
A Language ID from the sys.syslanguages table.

summary.para: A DbFunction method stub that can be used in LINQ queries to target the SQL Server CONTAINS store function.

Docs.returns: To be added.
Docs.remarks: This DbFunction method has no in-memory implementation and will throw if the query switches to client-evaluation. This can happen if the query contains one or more expressions that could not be translated to the store.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int DateDiffDay (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate);
.method public static hidebysig int32 DateDiffDay(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions _, valuetype System.DateTime startDate, valuetype System.DateTime endDate) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function DateDiffDay (_ As DbFunctions, startDate As DateTime, endDate As DateTime) As Integer
static member DateDiffDay : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctions * DateTime * DateTime -> int

Docs.summary: Counts the number of day boundaries crossed between the startDate and endDate. Corresponds to SQL Server's DATEDIFF(DAY,startDate,endDate).
Docs.returns: Number of day boundaries crossed between the dates.

Docs.summary: Counts the number of year boundaries crossed between the startDate and endDate. Corresponds to SQL Server's DATEDIFF(YEAR,startDate,endDate).
Docs.returns: Number of year boundaries crossed between the dates.

Docs.remarks: This DbFunction method has no in-memory implementation and will throw if the query switches to client-evaluation. This can happen if the query contains one or more expressions that could not be translated to the store.
